subject: Delegation of Powers to Regional Officers; NHAI for approval of Resources for Site Clearance; Removal/Demolition of Structure falling within Project ROW & Securing of ROW after taking Possession under 3(E) of NH Act; 1956-reg.
text: MRa 7zh (THRf gifeasrut (as4 4de7 &r TTHNf 4A4, 4RG TAR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Hra J4a 0i-5 Qai 6, #e7-10, Erau; # Aarf 110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TAI/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI Policy Guidelines/ Land Acquisition 2025 Policy Circular No_ 7.1.84/2025 dated 18th June, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. LADIV-11021/2/2024-COORD Division (Comp. No. 267694)} Sub: Delegation of Powers to Regional Officers, NHAI for approval of Resources for Site Clearance, Removal/Demolition of Structure falling within Project ROW & Securing of ROW after taking Possession under 3(E) of NH Act, 1956 -reg: Ref.: (i) Policy Circular No. 7.1.81/2025 dated 01.01.2025. The NHAI HQ Policy Circular No. 7.1.81/2025 dated 01.01.2025 on the above mentioned subject is hereby withdrawn with immediate effect until further Order / Direction. 2 This issue with the approval of Competent Authority. 18|blas (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) Ic Chief General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 . Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site 3. Web Admin for circulation. #7J5 NHA Copy
